trans-unit.source: Returns the object that supports the specified control pattern of the element that is associated with this automation peer.

trans-unit.source: Gets the total number of columns in a grid.
trans-unit.target: 获取网格中的总列数。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式接口成员的实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IGridProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用它时，才<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridAutomationPeer>实例被强制转换为<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IGridProvider>接口。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IGridProvider> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridAutomationPeer>

trans-unit.source: The total number of columns in a grid.
trans-unit.target: 在网格中的列的总数。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that specifies whether the [UI Automation provider](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) allows more than one child element to be selected concurrently.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，指定是否[UI 自动化提供程序](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)允许同时选择多个子元素。
